channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2023100483
item.description:
Report X-2023100483

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: COMMERCE CITY
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO SPILL LOCATION ANND ARRIVED WEARING PROPER PPE. PACKAGE AND SPILLED CONTENTS WERE CONTAINED FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND WERE TRANSPORTED BACK TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
